title: al-Kitāb al-Shāmil fī al-sinā’ah al-ṭibbīyah (The Complete Book on the Medical Art )
author: Ibn al-Nafīs (d. 1288)
description: The colophon tells us that the copy was completed 11 Rabī’ I 687 AH [15 Apr. 1288 CE] by ’Alī ibn Ibrahīm known as al-Ra’īm, in the same year in which the author died on 21 Dhū al-Qa’dah 687AH [17 Dec. 1288 CE].
